segments.text: This kitchen view is turning my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with dirty water, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and floor, what a filthy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, clueless, with her wet foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, pilfering cookies like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing precariously, probably dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, but she'll make it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water could mix with food bits on the floorâ€”gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's open, inviting ants or whatever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes in this slop; how unhygienic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks clean, but inside it's a pigsty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the carelessness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
